author: jvanzyl
msg: First step in refactoring the bootstrap so that we only have to keep
track of our JARs in one place. We can't use Maven until it's built :-(

author: jvanzyl
msg: Factoring out the getFile() method from the UpdateResources so that I
can use it in a new GetList task which is just like the old tdk task
that used a list of JARs. We will use this in the new bootstrap.

author: jvanzyl
msg: Using this file as the single place to that needs to be updated when
Maven requires new JARs for bootstrapping, building and running.
